Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.subtitle: Everything you need to know at a glance

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.desc: Report an issue or send a suggestion to help us imporove the app.

Breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb
Breadcrumb.subtitle: Select a page to navigate to.

Empty.subtitle: Start by configuring your Zakat profile.

NotComplete.title: Please complete your profile to continue
NotComplete.labelAssets: Add your assets to determine if you have to pay Zakat.
NotComplete.labelZakater: Configure your Zakat Day to determine when you should pay Zakat.
NotComplete.labelNonZakater:
Since Zakat is not due from you, you will have to monitor your assets and check when they exceed the Nisab threshold.



To do so you can come back to Zakkini and update your assets.

NisabToday.linkDesc: For rapid Nisab check you can visit:

NewProfile.title: Create profile
NewProfile.subtitle: Create and configure your Zakat profile.

Success.title: Profile created successfully!
Success.desc: You can continue configuring your profile by adding your assets. Otherwise, you can do this later.

Error.title: Oops!
Error.desc: An error occurred while creating the new profile, please try again.

Country.title: Select your country
Country.infoDesc: Enter the country you live in, the currency of this country will be the reference for Zakat.

Nisab.title: Nisab in {country} today
Nisab.infoDesc: Nisab is the minimum value of assets you can own before you are required to pay Zakat.

GoldSilver.infoDesc: Hanafi madhab uses silver to determine the Nisab for Zakat. The other madhabs use gold.

Nisab.title: My Nisab
Nisab.subtitle: The Nisab value in your living country.

Country.title: Your country
Country.infoDesc: Enter the country you live in, the currency of this country will be the reference for Zakat.

Nisab.title: Nisab in {country} today
Nisab.infoDesc: Nisab is the minimum value of assets you can own before you are required to pay Zakat.

GoldSilver.infoDesc: Hanafi madhab uses silver to determine the Nisab for Zakat. The other madhabs use gold.

Error.title: Oops!
Error.desc: An error occurred while updating your Nisab, please try again.

Assets.title: My Assets
Assets.subtitle: The record of all your assets on which Zakat will be calculated.

Error.title: Oops!
Error.desc: An error occurred while updating your assets, please try again.

Zakat.title: My Zakat
Zakat.subtitle: Manage your Zakat due.
Zakat.infoDesc: You need to figure out your Zakat Day. Please answer the following questions.

Hawl.q1Label: Did you pay Zakat last year?
Hawl.q2Label: Do you think it has been a year since you reached Nisab?

Yes1.infoDesc: Enter the date one lunar year after you paid Zakat last year (i.e. the same day in the Hijri calendar).

Yes2.infoDesc: If you know the exact day you reached Nisab, enter the date of one lunar year after it (in Hijri calendar), otherwise enter an approximate one. If in doubt consider today as your Zakat Day.

No2.infoDesc: If you know the exact day you reached Nisab, enter the date of one lunar year after it (in Hijri calendar), otherwise enter an approximate one. If in doubt consider one lunar year from today.

Hawl.zDayNB: This will be the Zakat Day also for the next years.

Error.title: Oops!
Error.desc: An error occurred while updating your Zakat Day, please try again.

ZDayCard.title: Zakat Day
ZDayCard.comeBack: Shortly to go: come back at Zakat Day to calculate your Zakat due.
ZDayCard.shouldPay: Attention: It's time to pay Zakat!

UpdateAssets.title: Update assets
UpdateAssets.update: Update your assets to calculate the amount of Zakat due.

DialogFull.title: Zakat payment
DialogFull.body: Do you confirm that you have paid the total amount of Zakat?
DialogFull.label: Zakat amount: {currency} {total}

Error.title: Oops!
Error.desc: An error occurred while saving Zakat payment, please try again.

Zakater.title: You are a Zakater!
Zakater.desc: You have exceeded the Nisab treshold, so Zakat is due from you.

NonZakater.title: Not yet...
NonZakater.desc: You have not exceeded the Nisab treshold, so Zakat is not due from you.

NisabZakat.title: Your status
NisabZakat.nisabWins: Your assets are under the Nisab treshold
NisabZakat.assetsWins: Your assets exceeded the Nisab treshold
